displayName: uts安卓原生扫码插件，谷歌MLKit机器学习扫描码-极速扫描二维码条形码
description: uts开发，接入谷歌扫码器（ML Kit Barcode Scanning API），毫秒级响应，导入即用(需打包成自定义基座)

declaration.permissions:
<!-- 获取相机权限 -->
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CAMERA" android:description="@string/permission_camera_description"/>
	<!-- 获取闪光灯权限 -->
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.FLASHLIGHT" android:description="@string/permission_flashlight_description"/>
	<!-- 相机特性 -->
	<uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.camera" android:required="true"/>
	<!-- 相机自动对焦特性 -->
	<uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.camera.autofocus" android:required="true"/>
	<!-- 震动权限 -->
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.VIBRATE" android:description="@string/permission_vibrate_description"/>
	<!-- 保持设备唤醒权限 -->
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WAKE_LOCK" android:description="@string/permission_wake_lock_description"/>
	<!-- 读取外部存储权限 -->
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" android:description="@string/permission_read_external_storage_description"/>
	<!-- 写入外部存储权限 -->
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" android:description="@string/permission_write_external_storage_description"/>
	<!-- Google ML Kit Vision 依赖 -->
	<meta-data android:name="com.google.mlkit.vision.DEPENDENCIES" android:value="barcode_ui"/>
